column4: you just tried to write 5000 blocks at 60GB each, no wonder mem was exhausted, I would have been, too :-)
thanks,  i only want to create an lvm volume behind /dev/loop0 and since it will be used for my virtual machines it should be big enough. do you have an idea how to proceed in here?
geberally there isn't much diff in speed between 1024 and 2048
